column2: BRIEF-New Oriental Education Says Q3 Revenues Up 41.2% YOY To $618.1 mln April 24 (Reuters) - New Oriental Education & Technology Group Inc: * NEW ORIENTAL ANNOUNCES RESULTS FOR THE THIRD FISCAL QUARTER ENDED FEBRUARY 28, 2018 * Q3 REVENUE $618.1 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $599.9 MILLION * QTRLY NON-GAAP NET INCOME PER ADS ATTRIBUTABLE $0.57 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
